1. i do post, its not only those 3 people you mentioned.
2. the reason i chose Fire Elemental is cause it attackes both back and 
front, you don't have to worry about getting trapped between to small 
armies.
3. i think you guys should make special scenes 4 the tournament, i'll even 
make a story to base them on if you ask.
